S.FORM: Bill Allen sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1945, Bill Allen, squliq na p'unro. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players
Bill Allen sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1945, Bill Allen, sqoliq na p'onro. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
